page.title: 16Shopping-Wootton,King's Lynn
page.content: In our area there are{five small {shops,}which have generally been made into small supermarkets and usually belong to the Spar group.These shops are used by the older people for the bulk of their shopping because of their closeness and also several offer delivery service. Generally the younger families either shop at a large{superstore, 1ml.away(Rainbow)or at Tesco's or Sainsbury's supermarkets in King's Lynn.The Rainbow store only opened last year and is gradually increasing custom. King's Lynn provides a good centre for all other shopping plus{markets}on Tuesday,Friday and Saturday but many families from Wootton choose to shop in Peterborough(Queensgate),Norwich and Cambridge,2or3 times a year(which are all approx.40miles away.
